# Changelog

## 1.2.1 (2016-08-04)
* Change `strict` rule from `"function"` to `"safe"`.

## 1.2.0 (2016-07-08)
* Removed quote-props rule (defaults to as-needed).

## 1.1.0 (2016-07-05)
* Add new rule `dollar-sign`: All variables that represent jQuery objects should be named starting with a `$`.

## 1.0.0 (2016-06-23)
* Initial release
